item.title: B&B Suède
B&B Dieweg
item.body: Enjoy the calm and tranquillity of a beautiful district in the south of Brussels. In a very pleasant environment, a charming multilingual lady, whose passions include travel, gardening and museums, will open the doors of her house to you. A welcome in French, Dutch, English German or Spanish.Twin room with washbasin "Bambou" - shared bathroom - 15 minutes from the city centre by car - stay from 2 to 30 days. Location : Dieweg - Brussels 1180 Access : Bus : 60 Tram 92- 97 close by.

item.title: B&B Woluwé
item.body: In a house which has been laid out with impeccable taste. Lots of greenery, and very warm welcome.Twin bed in the mezzanine (second floor) - private bathroom and WC - 15 minutes by underground from the city centre - no animals (1 dog in the house) - no smoker - stay : from 1 to 30 days. Location : rue de la Station de Woluwé - 1200 Bruxelles Access : Subway station Roodebeek Bus 42 Tram 39-44 (Montgomery)
item.address: rue de la station de Woluwé

item.title: B&B Latinis
item.body: Accommodation close to the freeway and to the airport. Easy access by tram, outside car parking.Bedroom with a single bed (3 rd floor) -Private bathroom and WC - Non-smoking - Guests may check in by 17.00 hours - No pets - Around 25 minutes by public transport from the city centre - Easy car parking. Min 2 nights, 6 nights. " Villo" station. Situation : avenue Latinis - 1030 Bruxelles Tram 23 - Bus 54 - 65 - 66

item.title: B&B Jourdan
item.body: In the heart of the european area, enjoy your stay in a large and comfortable flat located in a nice house. Your host is a town planner, likes walks and will welcome you in French, English or dutch. Excellent location, close to the Cinquantenaire park, the Natural Sciences Museum and the European institutions. In the surroundings, various restaurants and the famous chip shop "Antoine".Flat on the groundfloor (around 70 m2) with individual entrance - twin beds - ensuite bathroom and toilet - access to handicapped person - no pets - NO SMOKER - stay from 1 night to 1 month Location: chaussée Saint-Pierre - 1040 Brussels Access : subway station Schuman - busses 34, 59, 80

item.title: B&B Copernic
item.body: Guest room close by the weather Observatory of Brussels, you are welcome in a very nice house by a lovely couple in either French, Dutch, English or Italian. The area is calm and green, but close from numerous restaurants. The train station " Saint Job " is not far and the car parking easy.Twins bedroom ( 1st floor) - Bathroom to share with the family - no smoking - no pets - possible access to a TV (other room) - stay from 1 to 30 nights. Location : Rue Copernic 1180 Brussels Access : Tram : 92 Bus : 60 (quartier Européén) 134 (Gare du Midi) Train : St-Job (line 26)

item.title: B&B Broustin
item.body: This housing is located at a stone's throw of the 'Basilique de Koekelberg' in the north of Brussels. A music-loving landlord will welcome you in his large flat on the 2nd floor of a traditional Brussels House. You are at a 5-minute metro ride from the city centre. Stays from 1 to 30 nights.Double room (2de floor) - shared bathroom - non smoking - no pets - private entrance - free parking in the neighbourhood. Location : Av Broustin 1090 Bruxelles Access : Metro Simonis (a 5-minute walk) Tram 19 Bus 87 - ring Brussels (10 min.) -

item.title: B&B Invalides
item.body: Located in the East of Brussels in an area that is well deserved by public transport, a couple of retired persons who used to travel a lot will share their passion for their city. An important collection of travel books is waiting for you. Lots of restaurants in the neighborhood. Quick access to the European Center, the city center and the Expo park by underground. You are welcomed in French, English, Dutch and German.50 m² apartment (ground floor) - twin room - private showerroom and toilets - small terrace - stay from 1 to 30 nights - no smoking - no animals (1 dog in the house).Late arrivals ok , Location : Boulevard des Invalides 1160 Bruxelles Access : direct au ring (arrivée E 411) Métro : Beaulieu /Delta

item.title: B&B Auderghem
B&B Markelbach
B&B Berlaymont
item.body: Located in a quiet area, next to the European institutions, a comfy guest room is at your disposal. The city centre is only 10 minutes away by public transport. The landlady welcomes you either in French, Dutch or English.Twin room (1st floor) - Private shower and toilets - fridge - sauna - no pets - no smoking - Stays from 1 to 15 nights- possibility of garage Location : Av de la Brabançonne 1000 Bruxelles Access : Métro schuman Bus : 29-64-61-63 - 21-12 (Bus express aéroport)

item.title: B&B Democratie
B&B Boetendael
item.body: In the surroundings, various shops and restaurants, public transportation. Art lovers, your hosts will be pleased to inform you about cultural events and interesting sights of the town. Welcome in French and English. Double room (1st floor) - shared bathroom - no pets allowed - stay from 1 to 15 nights. Location: rue de Boetendael - 1180 Brussels Access : tramways 23 - 90 - 91 - 92 (10 min. walking distance)

item.title: B&B Notre Dame
item.body: In the north of Brussels, a friendly retired and multilingual lady has one guestroom available in her own flat. Located very close to the 'Basilique de Koekelberg' and to a weekly local market (Sundays). You will betaken care of in either French, Dutch, English, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese or German ! Stays from 2 to15 nights.Double room ( fourth stage )- shared bathroom - Radio - non smoking - no pets Location: Av Notre Dame de Lourdes 1090 Bruxelles Access : Bus 49 Tram 51 Métro Pannenhuis

item.title: B&B de la Brême
item.body: <object height="321" width="400"> <param value="http://www.youtube.com/v/26rdsY7rPrc?fs=1&hl=fr_FR" name="movie" /> <param value="true" name="allowFullScreen" /> <param value="always" name="allowscriptaccess" /><embed height="321" width="400" allowfullscreen="true" allowscriptaccess="always" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/26rdsY7rPrc?fs=1&hl=fr_FR"></embed></object>

item.title: B&B de l'Europe
item.body: This room is to be found in an excellent location 100 meters away from the Brussels Grand Place. After a day of work or discovery in Brussels, the landlords warmly welcome you in (French, English or Spanish) in their flat located on the first floor of a comfortable and calm building. Located nearby: museums, theatre, tourist walks, etc.Double room "Impératrice"- private bathroom - separate shared toilet - underground public parking - bicycles for rent - no smoking - no pets - stays from 1 to 3 nights Situatie : rue de la Montagne 1000 Bruxelles Access : Bus :34, 48, 95, 96. Tram : 91, 92, 93, 94, 23, 25, 52, 55, 56, 81. Métro : gare centrale

item.title: B&B Van Lerberghe
B&B Vandersmissen
item.body: object height="321" width="400">

item.title: B&B Père de Deken
item.body: In a neighbourhood in the East of Brussels, near a shopping street with lots of small restaurants, you are welcome in a pleasant, large house. The family is pleased to have you. The nearby public transportation brings you to the centre of the city in ten minutes. Cinquantenaire Park: 5 minutes.Double room on the 2nd floor - private bathroom - possibility to access the kitchen- no smokers - no animals - length of stay: 1 day to 1 month. Situation : Rue Père De Deken 1040 Brussels Metro Thieffrry - Bus 36 - Tram 7-90-39-44

item.title: B&B Bois de Sapins
item.body: Discover a nice house from the twenties located in a peaceful area. The house has been completely refurbished with style by the landlady who is passionate about decoration. The Woluwe Shopping Centre is located nearby for the shopping addicts. Also in the neighbourhood : Saint-Luc clinic, playground, student campus of Louvain en Woluwe, tennis court, mini-golf and lots of restaurants.Double room (on the ground floor) - private bathroom and toilet - no pets - stay from 2 to 15 nights. Location : Av du Bois de Sapins 1200 Brussels Bus : 28-42 Metro : Vandervelde ou Roodebeek

item.title: B&B Capitaine Piret
item.body: Located in a residential neighbourhood, spacious apartment, comfortable and decorated with great taste. Charming accommodation where you are assured of a warm welcome. Good location - 10 minutes by underground from the city centre. Stay for 2 to 7 nightsSingle room -bathroom shared with the guests - possibility to access the kitchen - non smoking Situation : avenue Capitaine Piret - 1150 Brussels Subway station : Gribaumont Bus 27 - 28 - 80

item.title: B&B Gisseleire Versé
item.body: <object height="321" width="400"> <param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/Pn1Oy-Dq7sA?fs=1&hl=fr_FR" /> <param name="allowFullScreen" value="true" /> <param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always" /><embed height="321" width="400" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/Pn1Oy-Dq7sA?fs=1&hl=fr_FR" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>

item.title: B&B Etangs d'Ixelles
item.body: The room is very well located in the area of the Ixelles ponds, Flagey place and La Cambre Abbey (Louise Ave). The landlady owning this Brussels house welcomes you either in French, Dutch or English. The area is within easy access from public transport and the city centre is 10 minutes away. In the neighbourhood: lots of restaurants and shops, local market every Saturday, Ixelles museum, etc.Double room (1st floor) - bathroom and toilets to be shared - terrace - no smoking - no pets - stays from 3 to 5 nights Situation : Chaussée de Vleurgat - 1000 Bruxelles Accès : Tram 23-25-93-94 Bus 38 (quartier européen)

item.title: B&B Marché au charbon
item.body: In the very heart of the city centre, a few steps away from the Grand Place, enjoy your stay in a house decorated in an original way by your hosts. French, English, Dutch and even a few words of Italian and Spanish are spoken. Various activities in the immediate surroundings: historic centre, museums, cinemas, shops, bars and restaurants, cybercafé Stay from 1 night to 3 nights.Double "Chocolat" room (3 rd floor) - ensuite shower and toilet - NON smoking - no pets allowed (2 dogs in the house) - paying car park at 50 metres.The owner reserves the right to assign the preferred room Location: rue Marché au Charbon - 1000 Brussels Access : metro station Bourse - tram 52-55-56-81 bus 3

item.title: B&B Barrière St Gilles
item.body: The entire family of this house will make you feel instantly at home. Located in a neighbourhood which is very close to the city centre, and at the heart of the Art Nouveau area.Double room and private bathroom (2nd floor) - no pets - stay from 1 day to 30 days - no smokers. Situation : chaussée d'Alsemberg - 1060 Bruxelles Metro Horta - Trams 3 - 4 - 33 -51

item.title: B&B François Bossaerts
item.body: Self-contained apartment. Ideal for a family or a group of friends. The proprietor is a lady with a very open personality. This guestroom is ideal place to spend a few days, two weeks. 15 minutes from the city centre by bus or tramway.Twin bed (2nd floor) - living room - dining room- kitchen -bathroom - WC - no smokers - no animals - stay from 2 days to 2 weeks. Location : rue François Bossaerts - 1030 Brussels Tram 90 - busses 54 & 65

item.title: B&B Bourgmestre Demunter
item.body: Located on the second floor of a very friendly house. Small, quiet room. Guests may use the garden. The landlord and landlady speak 5 languages (French, Dutch, Spanish, English and German).Double room - private bathroom - no smokers - no animals - length of stay: 1 to 21 nights. Situation : Av. Bourgmestre de Munter - 1090 Bruxelles Close to AZ Brugmann and to Parc des expositions " Heizel " - Bus 13 ,14 , 84 (to subway station Simonis . About 30 minutes from city centre.

item.title: B&B Keym
B&B BIhOme
item.body: Close to the majestic town hall of Schaarbeek, the owner of a mansion dating from 1902 offers a room designed to reduce the risks of allergy. Nearby: Les Halles de Schaerbeek, Le Botanique, the Autrique house and many other Art Nouveau buildings. Many restaurants and snack bars. Possibility of breakfast for specific allergies to lactose, gluten and BIO. With nice weather, the breakfast can be served in the garden, along with the rabbit. Twin Room (3rd Floor / stairs) private shower room and toilet - baby chair - no smoking - no pets - stay of 1 to 30 nights (no kitchen).Situation : av Maréchal Foch 1030 BruxellesAccess : tram : 7-55-92 Bus 58-59-65-66 Métro Botanique à 15 minutes à pied

item.title: B&B Reyers
item.body: Discover an accommodation decorated with taste in an original way, a few steps away from the Meiser place located in the North of Brussels. Easy access from the motorway and Brussels Airport. You are welcomed in French, English, Dutch or Spanish.Twin room (1st floor) "Le Grand Jacques" - private bathroom and toilets - no pets - no smoking - stays from 1 to 30 nights (without kitchen) Location : Boulevard Reyers 1030 Bruxelles Access : Tram 7 -25 Bus : 21-29-63-65 11 et 12 (Airportline)

item.title: B&B Vergote
item.body: <object height="321" width="400"> <param value="http://www.youtube.com/v/obgk0S9zzrM?fs=1&hl=fr_FR" name="movie" /> <param value="true" name="allowFullScreen" /> <param value="always" name="allowscriptaccess" /><embed height="321" width="400" allowfullscreen="true" allowscriptaccess="always" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/obgk0S9zzrM?fs=1&hl=fr_FR"></embed></object>

item.title: B&B Galeries
item.body: <object width="400" height="321"> <param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/iZ68_shCcmU?fs=1&hl=fr_FR" /> <param name="allowFullScreen" value="true" /> <param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always" /><embed width="400" height="321" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/iZ68_shCcmU?fs=1&hl=fr_FR" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>

item.title: B&B Le Valduc
item.body: Charming home hidden in a green area 10 minutes away from Brussels, in the heart of the Chant d'Oiseau area. Le Valduc was built in 1870 and its story, which is closely linked to Val-Duchesse, is rich and family based. Spots of the past are still present. Le Valduc is ideally located 10' away from the centre of Brussels, capital of Europe. It is located in the Chant d'Oiseau area, particularly prized for its green area and its proximity to strategic points.Double room - living room - private bathroom and toilets - extra (twin) room - no smoking - no pets - stays from 7 to 30 nights. Location : Av Edmond Cordier 1160 Bruxelles Access : Métro Hankar Bus 34-36

item.title: B&B Grand Place
item.body: In the very heart of the city centre, a few steps away from the Grand Place, enjoy your stay in a house decorated in an original way by your hosts. French, English, Dutch and even a few words of Italian and Spanish are spoken. Various activities in the immediate surroundings: historic centre, museums, cinemas, shops, bars and restaurants, cybercafé Stay from 1 night to 3 nights.Double room (3 rd floor) - ensuite shower and toilet - NON smoking - no pets allowed - paying car park at 150 metres.The owner reserves the right to assign the preferred room Location: rue Marché au Charbon - 1000 Brussels Access : metro station Anneessens- tram 52-55-56-81 bus 3

item.title: B&B Georges Henri
item.body: Accommodation in a village house located in calm area to the Eastern of Brussels. Thanks to public transport, you reach the city centre within 10 minutes. Shopping streets, restaurants, parc, ... are located nearby. You are welcomed in French.Double room " Chocolat " (2de floor) - private shower and toilets - stays from 1 to 8 nights. Situation : rue des Menuisiers 1200 Bruxelles Access : métro Gribaumont Bus : 22 - 39 - 44 -81

item.title: B&B Christopher's
item.body: <object width="400" height="321"> <param value="http://www.youtube.com/v/M-I5x1DbdY0?fs=1&hl=fr_FR" name="movie" /> <param value="true" name="allowFullScreen" /> <param value="always" name="allowscriptaccess" /><embed width="400" height="321" allowfullscreen="true" allowscriptaccess="always" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/M-I5x1DbdY0?fs=1&hl=fr_FR"></embed></object>

item.title: B&B Freesias Cosy
item.body: Accommodation located in an area north of Brussels near OTAN and the airport of Zaventem (BNA). With public transports, you can reach downtown in 25 minutes. Easy access from the highway. The owner welcomes you in French or with notions of English.single room - (3rd floor / lift) - bathroom and toilet shared with the guests- no smoking - no pets - stay of 1 to 15 nights.Situation : Allée des Freesias 1030 BruxellesAccess : tram 7 Bus 64 - 65 66 Pré-métro : Meiser

item.title: B&B les habitats nomades
item.body: Warm welcome in a house decorated in a tasty and original way and located in a multicultural area next to the city centre. Brussels South station is only a few steps away from the accommodation. The landlords, passionate about art and culture, welcome you either in French, Italian, English, Spanish and some German and Dutch. Stay from 1 to 30 nightsDouble bed "BD"(3rd floor) - private shouwer room and toilets - no smoking - no pets - pay parking (Brussels South station). Location : rue de l'Instruction 1070 Bruxelles Access : Gare du midi Tram 81-82-32

item.title: B&B A la villa des Roses Voltaire
item.body:
If you dream about calm and independence, this guest room will suit you perfectly. The landlords make a fully furnished studio duplex 65 m2 available for you. You are welcomed in French, Dutch and English for those who love green areas, the Josaphat Park is only a few steps away. Easy access from the motorway and the Zaventem airport.Twin room (3rd floor / stairs)- private bathroom and toilets- extra sofa bed- stays from 1 to 30 nights - no smoking - no pets.
Situation : avenue Voltaire 1030 Bruxelles (Schaerbeek)
.Access : Trams : 7 - 56 (gare du Nord) 92 Bus : 59-69

item.title: B&B Opale
item.body: Accommodation located in a residential district very close to the Cinquantenaire Park and the European district. Spacious room in Art Déco style, Moorish influence, with private bathroom and large terrace. Easy access by motorway and from Brussels airport. Numerous public transport lines, including to Brussels airport (10 minutes). Garage. Shops, green spaces and restaurants nearby. French, Dutch and English spoken; elementary knowledge of German and Italian. Also suitable for long stays as accommodation for a writer or comic strip author. Libraries of French-language and Dutch-language Belgian literature.Double room (1st floor) – extra sofa bed (2 people) – private bathroom - 1 to 31 night stays - no animals – No smoking - "Villo" (bicycle sharing) station.Situation : avenue de L'Opale 1030 BruxellesAccess : pré-Métro 7-25 Bus 21 -29- 61 -63 Bus aéroport 11 ou 12

item.title: B&B Jean Robie
item.body: In the heart of Brussels, in a quiet street in the historic district of Saint-Gilles, three young people in their thirties will welcome you in a newly renovated early 20th century house. The house is just a stone's throw from several traditional, lively brasseries and the Horta Museum, while the Grand Place is 20 minutes away on foot. The second floor of the house is entirely reserved for guests. French, English, Dutch and Spanish spoken.Large bedroom adjoining a living room, with a balcony overlooking the street – private toilets and bathroom. Possibility of an extra sofa bed, en-suite with the bedroom in the living room (ideal for a couple with children or friends travelling together).Situation : Rue Jean Robie - 1060 BruxellesAccess : Métro Horta (3-4-51), Tram 81-83-97, Bus 48-54

item.title: B&B Jamar
item.body: Accommodation in a brand new flat in a multicultural district just a stone's throw from Midi Station. French spoken. Double-bedded room on the 1st floor (lift) – private shower room (not adjoining the room) – small terrace – possibility to use the owner's living room (with TV) and kitchen (washing machine and dryer) - 1 to 15 night stays – no smoking – no pets – access to a closed garage.Situation : Boulevard Jamar 1060 Bruxelles Access : Gare du midi Tram 51- 81-82 Bus : 49 - 50 Métro

item.title: B&B Henri Jaspar
item.body: Accommodation located in the Art Nouveau district around Porte de Hal, one of the oldest city gates in Brussels. The owners of the premises will welcome you in French, English, Dutch and Spanish.The famous flea market on the "Place du jeu de balles", as well as numerous restaurants and shops are just a stone's throw away.Double-bedded room (1st floor) – private shower room and toilet – metered public parking - 1 to 30 night stays (without kitchen) – no smoking – no pets.Situation : Av Henri Jaspar 1060 BruxellesAccess : métro Hôtel des Monnaies Tram : 92-94 Bus 27 - 48 Gare du Midi

item.title: B&B Woluwé-cambre
item.body: The landlady will you offer you a very warm welcome in this family home in the east of Brussels. Lovers of green spaces will be able to discover the nearby Woluwé Park. Located in a quiet district with good public transport services. Easily accessible from the motorway. There are numerous shops and restaurants in the area and the Cinquantenaire Park and Square Montgomery are very nearby.Twin-bedded (or double) room (2nd floor) – private bathroom (+ shower) and toilet – no smoking – no pets - 1 to 30 night stays. Situation : rue de la Cambre 1150 Bruxelles Access : Tram 39-44 Métro : Gribaumont ou Josephine Charlotte

item.title: Noël's Bed&Breakfast
item.address: Chaussée de La Hulpe/Chaussée de la Hulpe
